metadata.title: CVE-2021-47240 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: qrtr: fix OOB Read in qrtr_endpoint_postSyzbot reported slab-out-of-bounds Read inqrtr_endpoint_post. The problem was in wrong_size_ type:	if (len != ALIGN(size, 4) + hdrlen)		goto err;If size from qrtr_hdr is 4294967293 (0xfffffffd), the result ofALIGN(size, 4) will be 0. In case of len == hdrlen and size == 4294967293in header this check won't fail and	skb_put_data(skb, data + hdrlen, size);will read out of bound from data, which is hdrlen allocated block.
